p: Helichrysum gymnocephalum (Immortal with naked head) is a shrub from 1 to 4 meters in height whose ultimate branches are covered by a white and very fine tomentum. The leaves are lengthily attenuated towards the base in short petioles, covered on the two faces by a tomentum and having three quite visible principal veins in lower part. Flowering lasts from February till May, seeds are also papillate [ 2].
